publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Ecclesiastes 6
ab.l: Bardyr jamanlyḥ ki ḱord́um ol qujaš t́ub́u- ńa da ḱopt́ur ol adam üśt́uńa.

Kiši ki b́erśa anar ol T́eńri ḥoǯalyḥ da mal da syj da bolmasa
ėksik ǯanyna baryndan ki ḱuśańśa da ėrkĺańdirḿaśa any ol T́eńri ašama andan ki tanyɣysyz kiši ašasa any daɣy bu da heč́- liktir da jaman ḥastalyḥtyr ol.
Ėǵer t́eri bolsa kiši öź jylɣa d́ejiń da ḱop bolsa ḱuńĺari t́erliginiń da ǯany tojmasa ol jaḥšydan da daɣy keŕakĺari zeŕatiniń bolmasa anar ajtamyn jaḥšyraḥ- tyr andan ol kečirgań.
Ki heč́lik byla keĺdi da qaranɣyɣa baryr da qaranɣy byla šemi saɣynčynyn jabulur.
Daɣy qujašny ḱorḿadi da biĺḿadi tynčraḥtyr bunar anadan.
Da ėǵer t́eri bolsa miń jyllar ėki anč́aḥ da jaḥšylyḥny korḿaśa muna bir orunɣa ol barysy baradyr.
Bar ömǵagi ol adamnyn avzu üč́uń daɣy ǯanyn tolturmejdyr.

Ki ńedir syjy uslunun ki bolɣaj ol t́eli- dań ńe fajdadyr miśkińga biĺuv́č́uǵa barma qaršysyna ol t́erlikniń. Jaḥšyraḥtyr ḱorḿagi ḱoźĺarniń barmaɣyndan ėśa ḱuśańč́ĺari byla ǯannyn daɣy budu heč́liktir da jeĺ kečińḿak.
Ńeki boldu boldu uže ataldy šemi anyn da bilińdi ki ol adam da bolalmastyr jarlyɣašlama ḱuč́ĺuŕakbyla öźuńd́ań.
Ki bardyr ḱop śoźĺar arttyruvčular heč́likni ńedir fajdasy adamnyn.
Ki kim biĺadir nińdi jaḥšylyḥ bolur adamɣa t́er- ligińd́a sanynda bu dunjalyḥ t́erliginiń da qylsa alarny ḱoĺaǵani kibik ki kim anlatyr adamɣa ńe bolur andan sortun ol qujaš t́ub́uńa.
